name: nativescript-advanced-webview
description: An advanced webview using Chrome CustomTabs on Android and SFSafariViewController on iOS.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug ios --emulator
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-advanced-webview && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.nuke: rm -rf node_modules && cd demo && rm -rf node_modules && cd ..
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-advanced-webview; tns plugin add .. && cd ..
